parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add an editing layer in [[Eden Editor]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> parentLayerID '''add3DENLayer''' name
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> parentLayerID : [[Number]] - ID of the parent layer. Use -1 to create the layer to root. No layer will be created when the ID doesn't point to a layer.
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - layer display name
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - layer ID

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myLayer = -1 [[add3DENLayer]] "Enemy Base";
_myLayerFort = _myLayer [[add3DENLayer]] "Fortifications";
_myLayerPatrol = _myLayer [[add3DENLayer]] "Patrols";
</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
[[remove3DENLayer]]
[[set3DENLayer]]
[[get3DENLayerEntities]]
</value></part></template></root>
